entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge walked past them towards the front rows, his expression miserable, twirling his green bowler hat as usual.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Harry next recognised Rita Skeeter, who, he was infuriated to see, had a notebook clutched in her red-taloned hand;

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge, an unconvincing expression of grief upon her toadlike face, a black velvet bow set atop her iron-coloured curls.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: At the sight of the centaur Firenze, who was standing like a sentinel near the water’s edge, she gave a start and scurried hastily into a seat a good distance away.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Harry could see Scrimgeour looking grave and dignified in the front row with Professor McGonagall.
